title: A wine centric tour of Bourgogne
text:
Getting to Bourgogne
We took TGV from Gare de Lyon in Paris to Dijon. From there, we rented a car and drove to Beaune.

title: A whirlewind trip to Galacia and Porto
text: I always say “leave things where you still want more”. We took it by heart with our recent Galicia - Porto trip. We spent only 3 nights 4 days in the Rias Baixas region of Galicia and Porto: 3.5 days and 2 nights in Rais Baixas, 1.5 days and 1 night in Porto. Yes, it was short and sweet.

title: A whirlewind trip to Galacia and Porto
text:
Getting there
Getting to Galicia from Chicago, you have two choices: fly into Santiago de Compostella airport, or Porto airport (of course, you have to connect via MAD or London, etc.) Particularly, we want to visit Rias Baixas, which is about similar distance driving from either airport (about 1.5 hours). Although we later found out that you can fly from MAD to Vigo, which is in Rias Baixas, and only 30 minutes from the hotel.
